column3: Inpatient But Not ICU or Outpatient

column10: Focal seizures which cannot be specified by its type
Generalized seizures which cannot be further classified into one of the groups below
Partial seizures during consciousness; Type specified by clinical signs only
Partial Seizures during unconsciousness; Type specified by clinical signs only
Absence discharges observed on EEG; patient loses consciousness for a few seconds (Petit Mal)
Stiffening of body during seizure (EEG effects disappears)
At first stiffening and then jerking of body (Grand Mal)
